entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon.
